name: Small Slipsilk Scrunchies - 6 pack
about: What it is: A set of skinny scrunchies made with specially selected elastic and a slipsilk covering...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..What Else You Need to Know:  Upgrade your hair tie game. From the makers of the Slip anti-aging, anti-sleep crease, anti-bed head pure silk pillowcase, these scrunchies were designed to avoid hair creases. They are made with specially selected elastic and a slipsilk covering to be gentle on your delicate hair...Slipsilk is specially-commissioned and made to Slipu2019s exacting standards, developed and refined over 10 years to provide the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness, and durability. They use the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, and enforce the strictest quality guidelines, including non-toxic dyes...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This Set Contains:.Mini Size:.- 3 x slip skinny scrunchies..Standard Size:.- 6 x slip skinny scrunchies...Allure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will start by acknowledging the reviews that they say these stretch out quickly. I havenu2019t had these long enough to see if this is the case and if it will be detrimental to the life of the scrunchie. I purchased this set on sale after loving the three pack I picked up in the Sephora checkout line. These scrunchies have been amazing for pulling my hair back when sleeping, pulling my hair back to wash my face, take a shower without getting my hair wet, and even for my slick back work ponytails. Even if these do stretch out I will continue to purchase. They donu2019t leave weird hair bubbles like the plastic spiral hair ties, they donu2019t pull my hair like traditional hair ties, and they donu2019t fall out like traditional scrunchies. They look and feel so comfortable and luxurious in my hair and they provide a solid hold without the damage or the headache. I love these scrunchies so much!

reviews.review_title: Stretched out very quickly, whatu2019s going on?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using SLIP scrunchies for a while. Theyu2019re expensive so I buy one pack and reuse the same scrunchie until it stretches out then Iu2019ll grab another one. This also helps with not losing them! The last pack of slip scrunchies I got was a 4 pack for Christmas last year. Iu2019ve been using the same scrunchie since December 2023 and itu2019s still looking great and has not stretched out. When I saw these were on sale I bought the blue pack because they reminded me of Iceland. Anyway, they got delivered on Saturday and I used a light grey one throughout the weekend and itu2019s already kind of stretched out. It looks worse than the one Iu2019ve been using since December 2023. Maybe I got a bad  pack? Rating 2 stars because I love the colors and maybe I got a dud but the others wonu2019t be. I sure hope they have decreased the quality of these!

reviews.review_title: Great Scrunchies, But They Warp Over Time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: These scrunchies are really great for specifically thinner hair, if you want something bigger Slip carries a more traditional scrunchie size. I reach for these often because they look cute, do not pull on their hair as much and are usually less prone to tangling within the hair. Compared to other scrunchies they have a little bit of volume/girth so they are easier to maneuver to your styling needs. The colors are also stunning, there's truly something for everyone and each pack comes with a great variety of both bolder and more neutral colors/patterns. I've purchased at least 3 packs of these are although i've lost a few scrunchies over the years there are a few that have been there from the start that are still around. The silk material works magic when removing out of hair because it does not pull on the hair strands like traditional scrunchies but instead uses the slippage of the silk to it's advantage by gently gliding off of the hair.   The Bad: A couple of these scrunchies have simply warped on me and had to be tossed. They get so stretched out and expanded that they lose their ability to function as a scrunchie and instead look like a small, silk rope. This has happened to several of mine and also to a pack I gave to my mom. I don't know if this is a coincidence but this happened to the caramel colored scrunchies we owned.  Mysteriously, other scrunchies do not warp and are great for years to come. Maybe a couple of duds in the pack? Bummer.  The Ugly/Honest: There are other satin products that feel truly identical to these silk scrunchies for a fraction of the price. For $6.50/scrunchie I would really appreciate to receive a pack that does not have 2 out of 6 scrunchies that oddly warp and expand. The product is a 4 star product, I took 1 star for the extremely high price and 1 star for the stretching/warping effect that occurs on some of the scrunchies seemingly overnight and without user-error reasoning.

I do love these and love the fact that I can wear them on my wrist without any discomfort but the longevity isnu2019t there as it is with other hair ties that I have used religiously for 6+ months until I lose them/ misplace them without any critical loss of elasticity.

reviews.review_text: It took me sooooo long to finally try these hair ties simply due to the price tag but I love them so much! Never tugs on my hair and can tie a decently tight pony tail but I will say that just like other fabric hair ties, it loosens over time and quite quickly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since I get highlights, Iu2019m very aware of using products that could damage my already fragile hair. I love these scrunchies for when I do a tight half up bun! It almost never rips out any hair and someone always noticed how cute they are!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Alright my loveu2019s, this product is great! I wear them every single day.  However if you are on a tight budget...just go to Winners or TJMax.  I donu2019t know if they are worth the extra money. Definitely a luxury item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these because I wanted something less damaging for my hair and these are perfect. Hair doesnu2019t get stuck in them like normal hair ties and they donu2019t leave marks in my hair. I bought these in August and itu2019s now the end of December and Iu2019m just noticing them stretch out. I make sure not to get them wet if Iu2019m in the pool or something and wait until my hair itu2019s almost completely dry before I use it. If you donu2019t get them wet they should last for months! These are the only hair ties I use now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These scrunchies are soft on the hair but stretch out so quickly. They don't last. Definitely not worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great hair tie - highly recommend it!!!!! Not damaging to my hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wear my hair in a bun everyday for work. Ever since using these I have not seen any of my hair being pulled out from me taking down my hair. These stay all day long as well. Could not recommend investing in these any more !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazing. I had been using plastic hair ties and they were ok. Earlier this year, I changed to using slip pillow cases.  I though these would be great to try and these are awesome. They donu2019t pull, they hold the ponytail tight, and I can keep it on my wrist and not remember itu2019s there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These hair ties are great for the first few uses. For how expensive they are, the elastic stretches out to the point where they wonu2019t fit on my wrist. Love the concept and small size of them, but not worth the money in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They still leave a crease in my hair. I want to like them because their cute but they are honestly not worth the price point.

reviews.review_title: Little scrunchie with a tight hold.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The mini scrunchie answers a lot of complaints people had about the lack of a tight hold from the large version of the silk Slip scrunchies.  The silk on the  mini version is more tightly packed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As expected: -D holds my fine hair all day with no slipping or creasing.  Going to purchase one for my mom for Christmas.

reviews.review_title: not sure if worth the price,but use mine everday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bands do stretch out; doubled in size for me. If Iu2019m careful not to tie my hair aggressively and be gentle then I can keep the band from stretching out. For the price though, I would hope the would do a better job. Other than that it didnu2019t crease my hair and feels very comfortable on. I think there are cheaper options out there. I only bought because I got a discount, but I donu2019t regret buying them also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw reviews about it stretching out and being short-lived but they donu2019t stretch out at all! I was skeptical if they would actually not leave any marks but they really donu2019t after hours. They are a bit expensive for a hairband but considering the money Iu2019ll save from using these forever, these are totally worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are pretty great. They look super cute and donu2019t damage your hair. Unfortunately they do stretch out quite a bit, which is highly disappointing considering their price... they really need to improve the elastic inside the scrunchy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are not worth the hype. They stretched out a ton after just a few uses and always fall out of my hair unless I wrap more times which continues to stretch them out further. They still leave dents and kinks just like any other hair elastic. You also donu2019t want to get any hair product on them, even my leave in conditioner made them have a weird texture change. They also donu2019t work as well in wet hair. Not worth the price tag!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great while they lasted but the inner elastics broke faster than regular elastics (goody for example).... so definitely not worth the investment. My fine blonde wavy hair didnu2019t notice a difference damage-wise either :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Totally digging these so far they are super comfortable. I never feel any tugging or pinching. I hope I donu2019t lose any of them like I normally do with hairties!!!

reviews.review_title: Would be perfect with better elastic inside!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These have been a game changer for me in the way that they greatly reduce the tangles and damage to my hair (which I wear in a bun almost constantly, including to bed). However, they have one major downfall, and that is that the elastic inside stretches so much that they are unusable within about a month of steady use. If they stretched but went back to normal size Iu2019d be ok with it because I could just rotate elastics, but once these start to go theyu2019re pretty much unusable. If they fixed this problem it would be 5 stars for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. I was skeptical at first and purchased them more for aesthetic reasons. I have shoulder length, bleached hair that I always have in a loose bun overnight and while Iu2019m home. With these silk scrunchies, when I let my hair down it you canu2019t even tell that I slept with my hair tied up. Started using it at work and it holds up just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite hair ties ever! Theyu2019re super soft and stretchy, and look super cute in the hair. Plus the added bonus of not damaging your hair as much as a regular band is amazing. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for pony tails especially for curly or thick hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great. Doesn't rip hair out. I will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are cute and practical. They donu2019t stretch out or break. Totally worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with these elastics. I love how soft they are! They are the only elastic I have ever used that does not rip out my hair when I take it out.  I wear a ponytail everyday for work and since I have started using these I have had minimal breakage.  They stretch out a bit so are not ideal for high ponytails but if you want less breakage and long beautiful hair... these are a must have!

reviews.review_title: no more chunks of hair in my hair ties
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing I am no longer losing hair like I did with my ouch-less ones from the drugstore. Worth every penny. I purchased based off my love of satin or silk pillowcases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! I sleep in these, and they donu2019t kink my hair. They are the perfect scrunchie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! I've been wearing them for a few weeks and they haven't stretched out yet. Feels like nothing in my hair! No neck tension and no kinks in my hair when I take them out. I've even worn them to gym classes and they've been totally fine. They look cute on your wrist too. Worth the $! I'm going back for more as gifts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice -- just what I was looking for -- a soft, silky scrunchie that isn't thick.  Works as a regular hair tie but also can be put around a bun without losing its stretchiness.  Love the thin design and classic colors.  Not cheap, but worth it because they look so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fell in love with these right away. Mine have lasted forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love them but the elastics in the scrunchies stretched out after the first week. My hairu2019s neither thick or thin and itu2019s about shoulder length and yet these scrunchies just keep slipping off my hair. I usually wrap them around my hair 2-3 times but the scrunchie will proceed to slide down my pony tail as I walk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these after hearing great things about Slip.... but I ended up stretching out my scrunches after only a week and Iu2019m super bummed about it. I actually have medium to thin hair so Iu2019m super bummed about that. Itu2019s too bad because they are so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect - they hold like regular hair ties, but without the damage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my Slip Sleep Mask so I decided to try these scrunchies to keep my long hair in a ponytail when I sleep.   They are made very well and look so nice I decided to wear them during the day.  These scrunchies do not cause hair breakage.    I took off on star because the price is a bit high ...

reviews.review_title: Works very well but stretches out after awhile
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They are cute and hold my hair well even through my most intense workouts. On the downside, they definitely stretch out after time. I have one that I can't even wear around my wrist anymore but I can still use it in my hair. For the price, these are definitely a treat yo self purchase/sale time buy.
